languages.text: "Муаран, что ведет нас — один из их числа. Дети Азуриана подчинены его воле, а он сам — воле своих прозрений. В видениях Муарану явился страдающий Лилэтан, требующий очищения — и мы устремили все силы на то, чтобы избавить Первозданный мир от мон-кай. Наши жизни, наши желания — все это лишь прах пред сиянием пути, избранного Муараном. По крайней мере, в это веруют мои собратья. Веровала и я... до недавних пор".

traits.locale_text: "Муаран, что ведет нас — один из их числа. Дети Асурьян подчинены его воле, а он сам — воле своих прозрений. В видениях Муарану явился страдающий Лилэтан, требующий очищения — и мы устремили все силы на то, чтобы избавить Первозданный мир от мон-кай. Наши жизни, наши желания — все это лишь прах пред сиянием пути, избранного Муараном. По крайней мере, в это веруют мои собратья. Веровала и я... до недавних пор".

languages.text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."
languages.original_text: "Муаран, что ведет нас — один из их числа. Дети Азуриана подчинены его воле, а он сам — воле своих прозрений. В видениях Муарану явился страдающий Лилэтан, требующий очищения — и мы устремили все силы на то, чтобы избавить Первозданный мир от мон-кай. Наши жизни, наши желания — все это лишь прах пред сиянием пути, избранного Муараном. По крайней мере, в это веруют мои собратья. Веровала и я... до недавних пор".

Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it to... until recently."

Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it to... until recently."

"Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

languages.text: 「ムアランはこの星における我らの指導者にして、先見の力を持つ者の一人だ。アシュリアンの御子らはムアランの意志に従い、ムアランはビジョンの意志に従う。ムアランがビジョンで見たリラエタンは、苦しみのあまりに浄化を求めて叫んでいた。そこで私たちは、このメイデンワールドからモン＝ケイを排除するために手を尽くした。命も、願いも…ムアランが我らに望んだ光の道に比べれば、すべては塵芥。少なくとも、同胞はそう信じている。我もかつてはそう信じていた…最近までは」
languages.original_text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

traits.locale_text: 「ムアランはこの星における我らの指導者にして、先見の力を持つ者の一人だ。アシュリアンの御子らはムアランの意志に従い、ムアランはビジョンの意志に従う。ムアランがビジョンで見たリラエタンは、苦しみのあまりに浄化を求めて叫んでいた。そこで私たちは、このメイデンワールドからモン＝ケイを排除するために手を尽くした。命も、願いも…ムアランが我らに望んだ光の道に比べれば、すべては塵芥。少なくとも、同胞はそう信じている。我もかつてはそう信じていた…最近までは」

languages.text: “我们的领袖穆兰就是其中之一。阿苏焉的子嗣服从他的意志，而他也服从那些幻景的意志。穆兰在幻景中看到了莉莱赞，看到了她在痛苦之中高声呼喊，需要净化，因此我们也在竭尽所能，将莉莱赞的猴子消灭掉。我们的生活、我们的欲望，这一切与穆兰为我们选择的光明之路相比，都如同尘埃一般，至少我的族人是这么认为的。我以前也这么认为……可现在，不再是了。”
languages.original_text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

traits.locale_text: “我们的领袖穆兰就是其中之一。阿苏焉的子嗣服从他的意志，而他也服从那些幻景的意志。穆兰在幻景中看到了莉莱赞，看到了她在痛苦之中高声呼喊，需要净化，因此我们也在竭尽所能，将莉莱赞的猴子消灭掉。我们的生活、我们的欲望，这一切与穆兰为我们选择的光明之路相比，都如同尘埃一般，至少我的族人是这么认为的。我以前也这么认为……可现在，不再是了。”

languages.text: «Muaran, nuestro líder, es uno de ellos. Los hijos de Asuryan están sujetos a su voluntad, y él a su vez es esclavo de sus visiones. Muaran vio el Lilaethan en una de tales visiones; sufría y rogaba que lo purificasen, así que hicimos cuanto pudimos por librar el mundo virgen de la plaga mon-keigh. Nuestras vidas, nuestros deseos... todo eso es polvo comparado con la luz de la senda que Muaran ha escogido para nosotros. Al menos, eso es lo que creen los míos. Yo también lo creía... hasta hace poco».
languages.original_text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

traits.locale_text: «Muaran, nuestro líder, es uno de ellos. Los hijos de Asuryan están sujetos a su voluntad, y él a su vez es esclavo de sus visiones. Muaran vio el Lilaethan en una de tales visiones; sufría y rogaba que lo purificasen, así que hicimos cuanto pudimos por librar el mundo virgen de la plaga mon-keigh. Nuestras vidas, nuestros deseos... todo eso es polvo comparado con la luz de la senda que Muaran ha escogido para nosotros. Al menos, eso es lo que creen los míos. Yo también lo creía... hasta hace poco».

languages.text: "Muaran, unser Anführer hier, gehört zu dieser Gruppe. Die Kinder von Asuryan unterstehen seinem Willen, und er untersteht dem Willen seiner Visionen. Muaran sah in einer Vision Lileath leiden und um Reinigung flehen, und darum taten wir alles, um die Jungfernwelt von den Chem-Pan-Sey zu befreien. Unser Leben, unsere Wünsche – all das ist nur Staub im Vergleich zu dem Licht des Pfades, den Muaran für uns gewählt hat. Zumindest glauben das die Meinen. Und ich habe es auch geglaubt ... bis vor Kurzem."
languages.original_text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

traits.locale_text: "Muaran, unser Anführer hier, gehört zu dieser Gruppe. Die Kinder von Asuryan unterstehen seinem Willen, und er untersteht dem Willen seiner Visionen. Muaran sah in einer Vision Lileath leiden und um Reinigung flehen, und darum taten wir alles, um die Jungfernwelt von den Chem-Pan-Sey zu befreien. Unser Leben, unser Wünsche – all das ist nur Staub im Vergleich zu dem Licht des Pfades, den Muaran für uns gewählt hat. Zumindest glauben das die Meinen. Und ich habe es auch geglaubt ... bis vor Kurzem."

languages.text: « Muaran, notre chef sur cette planète, appartient à ce groupe. Les enfants d'Asuryan sont soumis à sa volonté, et lui-même est soumis à la volonté de ses visions. C'est justement dans une vision que Muaran a vu la lilaethan, souffrant et implorant qu'on la purifie, et nous avons donc tout fait pour débarrasser ce monde vierge des mon-keigh. Nos vies, nos désirs... Tout n'est que poussière à côté de la lumière de la voie que nous a choisie Muaran. Du moins, c'est ce que croient mes semblables. Et ce que je croyais moi aussi... jusqu'à récemment. »
languages.original_text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

traits.locale_text: « Muaran, notre chef sur cette planète, appartient à ce groupe. Les enfants d'Asuryan sont soumis à sa volonté, et lui-même est soumis à la volonté de ses visions. C'est justement dans une vision que Muaran a vu la lilaethan, souffrant et implorant qu'on la purifie, et nous avons donc tout fait pour débarrasser ce monde vierge des mon-keigh. Nos vies, nos désirs... Tout n'est que poussière à côté de la lumière de la voie que nous a choisie Muaran. Du moins, c'est ce que croient mes semblables. Et ce que je croyais moi aussi... jusqu'à récemment. »

languages.text: "Buradaki liderimiz Muaran da onlardan. Asuryan'ın Çocukları onun, o da görülerinin buyruğuna tabidir. Muaran; bir görüsünde Lilaethan'ın acı çektiğini, arınmak için yakardığını gördü. Biz de Bakir Dünya'yı mon-keighdan kurtarmak için elimizden geleni yaptık. Hayatlarımız, arzularımız... Muaran'ın bizim için seçtiği yolun ışığına kıyasla esameleri okunmaz. En azından akrabalarım böyle düşünüyor. Bir zamanlar buna ben de inanırdım."
languages.original_text: "Muaran, our leader here, is one of that group. The Children of Asuryan are subject to his will, and he is subject to the will of his visions. Muaran saw the Lilaethan in a vision, suffering and crying out to be cleansed, and we did everything we could to rid the Maiden World of the mon-keigh. Our lives, our desires — all that is dust compared to the light of the path Muaran has chosen for us. At least, that is what my kin believe. I used to believe it too... until recently."

traits.locale_text: "Buradaki liderimiz Muaran da onlardan. Asuryan'ın Çocukları onun, o da görülerinin buyruğuna tabidir. Muaran; bir görüsünde Lilaethan'ın acı çektiğini, arınmak için yakardığını gördü. Biz de Bakir Dünya'yı mon-keighdan kurtarmak için elimizden geleni yaptık. Hayatlarımız, arzularımız... Muaran'ın bizim için seçtiği yolun ışığına kıyasla esameleri okunmaz. En azından akrabalarım böyle düşünüyor. Bir zamanlar buna ben de inanırdım."
